name: Nakiti Generations
description: 2D action adventure game set in the far future on a mysterious abandoned planet with yourself as the only survivor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: Core2Duo 2.0 ghz or greater Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Low spec windows tablets will have performance issues.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: i3 or newer Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
